recommendations.title: Optimize Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) instances
recommendations.description: Reduce the instance type or number of instances based on usage patterns.
steps: Analyze EC2 usage patterns.
Identify underutilized instances.
Downsize or terminate underutilized instances.
Consider using Spot Instances for cost savings.

recommendations.title: Implement Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3) lifecycle policies
recommendations.description: Set up lifecycle policies to automatically move older data to cheaper storage classes.
steps: Create a lifecycle policy for your S3 bucket.
Define rules for transitioning objects to cheaper storage classes.
Set up a default storage class for new objects.
Test the lifecycle policy before enabling it.

recommendations.title: Optimize MongoDB Instance Type
recommendations.description: Reduce the instance type of MongoDB to a smaller, less expensive one while ensuring it still meets the application's performance requirements.
steps: Analyze current MongoDB instance type and usage.
Choose a smaller instance type that meets the application's performance requirements.
Modify the MongoDB instance type in the AWS Management Console.

recommendations.title: Implement Data Archiving
recommendations.description: Archive older data to a cheaper storage class to reduce the cost of storing large amounts of data that are rarely accessed.
steps: Identify data that can be archived.
Configure MongoDB to use a cheaper storage class for archived data.
Implement a data archiving and retrieval strategy.

recommendations.title: Optimize S3 Storage Costs
recommendations.description: Reduce the cost of S3 storage by implementing lifecycle policies and archiving infrequently accessed data.
steps: Create S3 lifecycle policies to move older data to cheaper storage classes.
Enable versioning on your S3 buckets to prevent accidental deletion of data.

recommendations.title: Optimize Data Transfer Costs
recommendations.description: Reduce the cost of data transfer by using Amazon CloudFront or transferring data during off-peak hours.
steps: Use Amazon CloudFront to cache static content and reduce data transfer costs.
Transfer data during off-peak hours to take advantage of lower data transfer rates.

recommendations.title: Optimize Network Data Transfer Costs
recommendations.description: Reduce data transfer costs by implementing data compression and optimizing network traffic.
steps: Enable data compression for outgoing and incoming data.
Optimize network traffic by reducing unnecessary requests and responses.
Consider using AWS Data Transfer Acceleration for faster and more cost-effective data transfers.

recommendations.title: Use Reserved Instances for Elastic Load Balancer
recommendations.description: Purchase Reserved Instances for Elastic Load Balancer to save up to 60% on usage costs.
steps: Navigate to the EC2 Reserved Instances page in the AWS Management Console.
Select the appropriate instance type and usage duration for your Elastic Load Balancer.
Purchase the Reserved Instance and apply it to your Elastic Load Balancer.

recommendations.title: Optimize CloudWatch Logs Retention
recommendations.description: Reduce the retention period of CloudWatch logs to lower storage costs.
steps: Navigate to the CloudWatch console.
Select Log groups.
Modify the retention period to a shorter duration.
Save the changes.

recommendations.title: Consolidate Monitoring Services
recommendations.description: Consolidate multiple monitoring services into a single service to reduce costs.
steps: Identify redundant monitoring services.
Evaluate the impact of consolidation on application performance.
Consolidate the services.
Monitor the application performance post-consolidation.
